newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Australia's AMP signs A$500 mln contract with CSC.
newsitem.headline: Australia's AMP signs A$500 mln contract with CSC.

text.p: The Australian Mutual Provident Society (AMP) said on Tuesday that it had signed a new A$500 million outsourcing contract with CSC Australia Pty Ltd which lasts until November 2003.
AMP, Australia's largest life insurance and funds management group, said CSC Australia would provide all mainframe, midrange processing and desktop services to AMP in Australia.
It said the new value-based contract significantly expanded the range of services to be provided since the original contract was signed in November 1993.
